snippet.title: Motocross The Game - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Support the game on Kickstarter: https://mxthega.me/kickstarter

Motocross The Game is the game that gamers have been dreaming of for decades: A hyper-realistic motocross simulator based on online competition, available on both PC and next-gen consoles, with cross-play capabilities.

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://mxthega.me/steam

© 2024 Virtual MX LLC. 

FOLLOW US ON:

- Twitch https://mxthega.me/twitch
- Threads https://mxthega.me/threads

#pc #pcgames #console #esports #motocross #supercross #simulator
